cable.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a plastic or rubber tube containing wires that carry telephone messages, electronic signals, television pictures etc
cable.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a thick strong metal rope used on ships, to support bridges etc
cable.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a system of broadcasting television by using cables, paid for by the person watching it

cable.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a tube containing wires that carry electronic signals or information

cable.translation[2].definitions[1].defi: a system of broadcasting television programmes by means of cables under the ground instead of signals through the air
